name: biter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, especially a child, or an animal that regularly bites people: What should you do if you have a child who is a biter? Last year, the pit bull terrier was statistically the county's biggest biter, but this year it ranks second to the German shepherd dog.
More examplesFewer examplesIn every nursery, there is a biter.The brown water snake is non-venomous, but it is a biter nonetheless.Dogs that haven't been properly socialized or receive little attention often turn into biters.
